title: The configuration for a Pushover trigger handler
description: Defines the Pushover messages to send.

userKeys.description: The list of user keys to send notifications to when this handler is triggered.

caption.description: Caption to send with the message. Default is the name of the trigger.

url.description: A supplementary URL to show with your message.

url_title.description: A title for your supplementary URL, otherwise just the URL is shown.

priority.description: Send as -2 to generate no notification/alert, -1 to always send as a quiet notification, 1 to display as high-priority and bypass the user's quiet hours, or 2 to also require confirmation from the user

sound.description: Pushover notification sound to play. If unspecified the Pushover default is used. See https://pushover.net/api#sounds to play each of the sounds.

annotateImage.description: Set to true to send an image with annotations overlaid for detected objects.

cooldownTime.description: Number of seconds required between sending notifications to the listed users.

enabled.description: Enables the Pushover handler on this trigger. Default is true.
